name: LASTIT (Demo version)
description:
LASTIT is a single player pc game , pixel art, minimalism style, and crafting game. The game challenges you to play as an alchemist stuck in a cave full of monsters. "Every monster in the cave can kill you with a single attack. Fight !" You only have a lamp in your hand that gives light. In low visibility, will you escape or fight fast and fierce monsters?

Highlight

The highlight of the LASTIT game is the challenge of disadvantaged player when facing enemies. In this game, the weak alchemist is full of wisdom. He uses alchemy to transform the material from the bones of the monsters that he killed into 20 different types of bombs. Explosion has two methods of use: used for self-defense such as smoke bombs and attacks such as fire. Aside from the basic bombs like other games, we have a lot of bombs that Alchemist can do.
